ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack!  Don t use HQ Bear pelts.  They are used for making 10 slot backpacks. If nothing else you can sell them to a tailor for 10 plat each.  The skins that
ygData.messageBody:
Ack! Don't use HQ Bear pelts. They are used for making 10 slot backpacks.
If nothing else you can sell them to a tailor for 10 plat each. The skins
that work for lined poison vial are:
a.. low quality bear skin
b.. low/med/high cat pelt
c.. polar bear skin
d.. puma skin
e.. white wolf skin
f.. grizzly bear skin
g.. zombie skin (very useful - stackable)
h.. blackburrow gnoll skin
i.. mist wolf
j.. black wolf skin
This info comes from AllaKhazams web site at
http://everquest.gamestats.com/. Click on Skills, then Pottery, then on
Pottery Recipes.

-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Testa [mailto:caroljt@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 10:46 PM
To: EQ_Potters
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials



Does anyone know what type pelts are needed to
make lined vials? I have been asked to make some for an enchanter friend.

I have tried 1 lined Vial sketch, one flask water,
1 small block of clay, and either a High Quality Bear skin or a Zombie
skin.



Chrysiana

Master Potter Cazic Thule
